name: sailpoint-identitynow
label: SailPoint IdentityNow
description: SailPoint IdentityNow that allows you to easily control user access to all systems and applications, enhance audit response and increase your operational efficiency. This connector facilitates automated operation for identity management.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: URL of the SailPoint IdentityNow server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: URL of the SailPoint IdentityNow server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: client_id
fields.tooltip: Client ID to access the SailPoint IdentityNow server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Client ID to access the SailPoint IdentityNow server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: client_secret
fields.tooltip: Client Secret to access the SailPoint IdentityNow to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Client Secret to access the SailPoint IdentityNow to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Get Accounts
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all accounts details from the SailPoint IdentityNow system.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filter result based on provided filter Filtering is supported for the following fields and operators:
id: eq, in 
 identityId: eq 
 name: eq, in 
 nativeIdentity: eq, in 
 sourceId: eq, in 
 uncorrelated: eq.Please refer this link https://developer.sailpoint.com/docs/standard_collection_parameters.html
parameters.tooltip:
Filter result based on provided filter Filtering is supported for the following fields and operators:
id: eq, in 
 identityId: eq 
 name: eq, in 
 nativeIdentity: eq, in 
 sourceId: eq, in 
 uncorrelated: eq.

parameters.title: Detail Level
parameters.name: detailLevel
parameters.tooltip: Determines whether Slim, or increased level of detail is provided for each account in the returned list. FULL is the default behavior.
parameters.description: Determines whether Slim, or increased level of detail is provided for each account in the returned list. FULL is the default behavior.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Max number of results to return.
parameters.description: Max number of results to return.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Offset into the full result set. Usually specified with limit to paginate through the results.
parameters.description: Offset into the full result set. Usually specified with limit to paginate through the results.

operations.title: Get Account Details
operations.description: Retrieves a account detail based on the ID.

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the account for which you are retrieving details
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account for which you are retrieving details

operations.title: Get Account Activities
operations.description: This gets a collection of account activities that satisfy the given query parameters.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: account_type
parameters.tooltip: The type of account activity.
parameters.description: The type of account activity.

parameters.title: Requested For
parameters.name: requested-for
parameters.tooltip: The identity that the activity was requested for. "me" indicates the current user. Mutually exclusive with regarding-identity.
parameters.description: The identity that the activity was requested for. "me" indicates the current user. Mutually exclusive with regarding-identity.

parameters.title: Requested By
parameters.name: requested-by
parameters.tooltip: The identity that requested the activity. me indicates the current user. Mutually exclusive with regarding-identity.
parameters.description: The identity that requested the activity. me indicates the current user. Mutually exclusive with regarding-identity.

parameters.title: Regarding Identity
parameters.name: regarding-identity
parameters.tooltip: The specified identity will be either the requester or target of the account activity. me indicates the current user. Mutually exclusive with requested-for and requested-by.
parameters.description: The specified identity will be either the requester or target of the account activity. me indicates the current user. Mutually exclusive with requested-for and requested-by.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sorters
parameters.tooltip: Sort results based on selected field. Sorting is supported for the following fields: type, created, modified
parameters.description: Sort results based on selected field. Sorting is supported for the following fields: type, created, modified

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Max number of results to return.
parameters.description: Max number of results to return.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Offset into the full result set. Usually specified with limit to paginate through the results.
parameters.description: Offset into the full result set. Usually specified with limit to paginate through the results.

operations.title: Get Account Activity
operations.description: This gets a collection of account activities that satisfy the given query parameters.

parameters.title: Activity ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: The account activity id.
parameters.description: The account activity id.

parameters.title: User Name
parameters.name: userName
parameters.tooltip: The login name of the user.
parameters.description: The login name of the user.

parameters.title: Source Name
parameters.name: sourceName
parameters.tooltip: The display name of the source.
parameters.description: The display name of the source.

operations.title: Reset Password
operations.description: Set a password for an identity. The password can only be set by the actual identity owner or by a trusted API client application.

parameters.title: User Name
parameters.name: userName
parameters.tooltip: The login name of the user.
parameters.description: The login name of the user.

parameters.title: Source Name
parameters.name: sourceName
parameters.tooltip: The display name of the source.
parameters.description: The display name of the source.

parameters.title: Identity ID
parameters.name: identityId
parameters.tooltip: The identity ID that requested the password change.
parameters.description: The identity ID that requested the password change.

parameters.title: Password
parameters.name: password
parameters.tooltip: The RSA encrypted password
parameters.description: The RSA encrypted password

parameters.title: Public Key ID
parameters.name: publicKeyId
parameters.tooltip: The encryption key ID
parameters.description: The encryption key ID

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: Account ID of the account This is specified per account schema in the source configuration. It is used to distinguish accounts. More info can be found here https://community.sailpoint.com/t5/IdentityNow-Connectors/How-do-I-designate-an-account-attribute-as-the-Account-ID-for-a/ta-p/80350
parameters.description: Account ID of the account This is specified per account schema in the source configuration. It is used to distinguish accounts. More info can be found here https://community.sailpoint.com/t5/IdentityNow-Connectors/How-do-I-designate-an-account-attribute-as-the-Account-ID-for-a/ta-p/80350

parameters.title: Source ID
parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the source for which identity is requesting the password change.
parameters.description: The ID of the source for which identity is requesting the password change.

parameters.title: ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: The account id.
parameters.description: The account id.

parameters.title: External Verification ID
parameters.name: externalVerificationId
parameters.tooltip: If set, an external process validates that the user wants to proceed with this request.
parameters.description: If set, an external process validates that the user wants to proceed with this request.

parameters.title: Force Provisioning
parameters.name: forceProvisioning
parameters.tooltip: If set, provisioning updates the account attribute at the source. This option is used when the account is not synced to ensure the attribute is updated. Providing 'true' for an unlocked account will add and process 'Unlock' operation by the workflow.
parameters.description: If set, provisioning updates the account attribute at the source. This option is used when the account is not synced to ensure the attribute is updated. Providing 'true' for an unlocked account will add and process 'Unlock' operation by the workflow.

parameters.title: ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: The account id.
parameters.description: The account id.

parameters.description: If set, an external process validates that the user wants to proceed with this request.

parameters.tooltip: If set, provisioning updates the account attribute at the source. This option is used when the account is not synced to ensure the attribute is updated. Providing 'true' for an unlocked account will add and process 'Unlock' operation by the workflow.
parameters.description: If set, provisioning updates the account attribute at the source. This option is used when the account is not synced to ensure the attribute is updated. Providing 'true' for an unlocked account will add and process 'Unlock' operation by the workflow.

parameters.title: Unlock IDN Account
parameters.name: unlockIDNAccount
parameters.tooltip: If set, the IDN account is unlocked after the workflow completes.
parameters.description: If set, the IDN account is unlocked after the workflow completes.

parameters.title: Force Provisioning
parameters.name: forceProvisioning
parameters.tooltip: If set, provisioning updates the account attribute at the source. This option is used when the account is not synced to ensure the attribute is updated.

parameters.title: Requested For
parameters.name: requestedFor
parameters.tooltip: Specify a CSV list of Identity IDs for whom the Access is requested.
parameters.description: Specify a CSV list of Identity IDs for whom the Access is requested.

parameters.title: Requested Items
parameters.name: requestedItems
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type, id, comment JSON data in key-value pairs.
parameters.description: Specify the type, id, comment JSON data in key-value pairs.

value.comment: Requesting access profile for John Doe

parameters.name: clientMetadata
